model_performance.assessment: Model converged well with good precision/recall balance

high_confusion_risk.description: Classes likely confused with other items

classes.name: ayam bakar
classes.reason: Similar appearance to ayam goreng and nugget

classes.name: ayam goreng
classes.reason: Similar to ayam bakar, golden color matches fried items
classes.recommendation: Increase dataset with varied frying styles

classes.name: nasi goreng
classes.reason: Similar to nasi putih and capcay (mixed rice dishes)
classes.recommendation: Add more mixed rice vs single rice samples

classes.name: gado-gado
classes.reason: Mixed ingredients with multiple food types

classes.name: bakso
classes.reason: Balls in soup - similar to pempek in shape/color

classes.name: tahu
classes.reason: Light color, cubic shape - confused with tempe/kerupuk
classes.recommendation: Add more distinct tofu plate presentations

potentially_underrepresented.description: Classes likely to have smaller dataset size
potentially_underrepresented.reason: Regional/specialized foods, less common in training data

overall_assessment.main_challenge: Distinguishing similar-looking cooked items (fried items, rice dishes)
overall_assessment.dataset_needs: More diverse lighting, angles, and plating styles for confused class pairs

immediate: Increase samples for high-confusion class pairs (ayam bakar/goreng, nasi goreng/putih)
Add dataset diversity: varied lighting, angles, plate presentations
Focus on regional/specialized foods (kerupuk, pempek, sate)
medium_term: Data augmentation: rotation, brightness, noise for similar classes
Mixed ingredient analysis for composite dishes (gado-gado, capcay)
Real-world testing: collect false positives from production usage
long_term: Multi-stage detection: classify item type then subtype (e.g., fried → ayam/tahu/kerupuk)
Ensemble methods: combine multiple models for high-confusion classes
User feedback loop: retrain with production false positives

phase_1.action: Collect 50+ new samples per class with diverse angles/lighting

phase_3.action: Deploy current model, collect false positives for future retraining
